Token.Name: LambosForVirgins
Token.Slogan: Curing virginity, one Lambo at a time.

About.Heading: About LambosForVirgins
About.Description: Welcome to LambosForVirgins ($LFV). The mission: to solve global issues through the power of Lamborghini's. This project brings together the thrill of Italian horsepower and the power of the community. $LFV isn't just a coin - it's a movement that tackles the declining birth rate. One lonely soul at a time. We're here to gift Lambos to selected bag holders making them irresistible to the opposite sex.
About.Footnote: It's bold. It's serious. It will save humanity from extinction, and it's definitely going to work.

Instructions.Title: How Does $LFV Work?
Instructions.Description: $LFV is a fair-launch, community-driven meme coin with one purpose: to put Lambos in the hands of its holders. Here's how it works:

Steps.Hold: Hold $LFV Tokens: The more $LFV you hold, the better your chances of participating in giveaways.
Steps.Submit: Lambo Giveaways: Holders submit their wallet address and a short video or not.
Steps.Wait: Confidence Surge: Winners receive a Lamborghini. Their confidence skyrockets, connections happen, and Lambo Babies are born.

Directions.Description: To enter, submit either a written entry or a short video (30 seconds to 2 minutes) that includes:

Steps.Who: Your Story: Share a bit about your life, your challenges, and how a Lamborghini could positively impact your life.
Steps.Why: Why You Deserve the Lambo: Explain why winning a Lamborghini would boost your confidence and maybe even help you make more connections.
Steps.What: Your Unique Style: Use humour, sincerity, or any personal flair - your entry should showcase why you're a great choice for the community to rally behind.

Directions.Footnote: This is your chance to get creative, share your story, and connect with the $LFV community.

Errors.FileEmpty: Please upload the lamest video possible
Errors.AddressEmpty: Please enter a valid Solana address
